mapper.select: select * from ITV_REGIST where doctor_id = #{id} order by TO_DAYS(REG_TIME) DESC, REG_TIME-TO_DAYS(REG_TIME)
SELECT * FROM (select * from ITV_REGIST where doctor_id in (select id from doctor) ORDER BY REG_TIME DESC) st GROUP BY st.doctor_id

SELECT * FROM (select * from ITV_REGIST where doctor_id in
#{item}
ORDER BY REG_TIME DESC) users LEFT JOIN ITV_RECORD on(ITV_RECORD.REGIST_ID = users.ID)
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-1)
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-2)
GROUP BY users.doctor_id limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (select * from ITV_REGIST where doctor_id in #{item}
ORDER BY REG_TIME DESC) users
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-1)
and TO_DAYS(users.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-2)
GROUP BY users.doctor_id) doc_user

select count(*) from ITV_REGIST
doctor_id = #{id}
and TO_DAYS(ITV_REGIST.REG_TIME) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
and TO_DAYS(ITV_REGIST.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-1)
and TO_DAYS(ITV_REGIST.REG_TIME) = (TO_DAYS(NOW())-2)
